name: Langle Addons for Elementor
author: autocircle

sections.description:
Langle Addons for Elementor is an addon of Elementor Website Builder which come with awesome 18 widgets and more coming soon. With Langle Addon you have the top most ability to modify each addons with maximum options than others 3rd party addons in the market. All our elements are very easy to use and built for your need.

At a galance of Langle Addons widgets

Widget List

  • Card
  • Content Switcher
  • Creative Button
  • Dual Button
  • Flip Box
  • Gradient Heading
  • Image Compare
  • Infobox
  • Logo Grid
  • Number
  • Photo Stack
  • Pricing Table
  • Review
  • Skill Bars
  • Step Flow
  • Team Member
  • Testimonial

Optimize Speed

Most 3rd party addons for Elementor are loads all the assets files which cause your site’s loading speed slow. Langle Addons loads only active elements assets to load your website faster.

24/7 Support

Our team is on hand to assist you with any unique request you might have. We answer support tickets everyday and usually try to answer even within just one hour.
sections.installation:
Note : This plugin works with Elementor. Make sure you have Elementor installed.

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Now you are ready to use our Langle Addons inside Elementor editing screen.
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No. You cannot use Langle Addons without Elementor since it’s an addon for Elementor.

Does it work along with other Elementor Addons?

Yes, it does.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! It will work with any theme where Elementor works. And it best works with Hello Elementor.

Does it work with Elementor Pro?

Yes, undoubtedly.

Will Langle Addons break my site after an update?

No, It won’t break your site or any page where you used our plugin. But we always recommend to keep back up of your site before updating our plugin. In case if anything happens you can revert back and contact our support team immediately.

Does this addon has any premium version?

No, currently we don’t have any premium version. But we are working on it.
